Package game.actions.actorActions

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AreaAttackAction
    A class that represents an area attack action, which allows the actor to attack any adjacent actors with a given weapon.
    AttackAction
    An Action to attack another Actor.
    ConsumeAction
    A class that represents the action of an actor consuming a consumable item.
    DeathAction
    An action executed when an actor is killed.
    DespawnedAction
    An action that removes an actor from the game map, typically used when the actor is despawned.
    QuickStepAction
    QuickStepAction, the special skill of weapon GreatKnife It extends Action class
    ResetAction
    An action that is executed when the game is reset.
    RestAction
    Special action for an Actor to rest at a Site of Lost Grace.
    UnsheatheAction
    Special Action class that allows an actor to unsheathe a WeaponItem on an enemy Actor.
